definition: consisting of or made of wood of the birch tree, a switch consisting of a twig or a bundle of twigs from a birch tree, to whip with a birch twig
details:
adjective
- consisting of or made of wood of the birch tree
= synonyms: birchen, birken
noun
- a switch consisting of a twig or a bundle of twigs from a birch tree
= synonyms: birch rod
- any betulaceous tree or shrub of the genus Betula having a thin peeling bark
= synonyms: birch tree
- hard close-grained wood of any of various birch trees
verb
- to whip with a birch twig
= example: to whip with a birch twig
